items.sentence: She advised him to take better care of himself.
We were just talking about you when you called.
Tom didn\'t want to admit that he didn\'t know.
Is there anything to drink in the refrigerator?
It will be to your advantage to study hard now.
Tom looked deeply into Mary\'s eyes and smiled.
Tom parked the truck in front of Mary\'s house.
Tom accidentally broke his favorite coffee mug.
Tom admitted he had no idea where his wife was.
Tom advised Mary not to believe what John said.
